title: Got bugsplat during a ranked game once client restarted it didnt recognise I was already in a game
body:
I was playing a ranked game when my client got a blugsplat after alt+tabbing to a different window, when the client opened back up it didnt recognise that I was already in a game and just sent me to the home screen, I wasn't sure what happened so I was going to see if I could queue back up and it worked.
as seen in this screenshot ( https://gyazo.com/5b55721a9c3d3beaa009d7974db6fdb3 ) It still says im in game but I am in champ select in a different match. I don't know if this is because I have the client set to close whenever I start the game or what. Will I get punished for this?

replies.body: It almost sounds like the game might have crashed entirely for everyone in the match. It's pretty rare, but it can happen sometime. When it does, the game essentially ends, typically isn't recorded, and everyone is able to queue back up without penalties.
